attributes.action: Stop the pms plans on school holidays
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to cancel Rishi Sunaks plans on changing school schedule
attributes.background: Rishi Sunak has been reducing school holidays which is not needed. Most people need a break from schools since they are stressful and the worst is that teachers are not getting payed enough si the point

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Government has not announced any plans to reduce the length of school summer holidays in England, so we're not sure what you want the Government or Parliament to do.
